mdRecord.dcterms:title: Personal Correspondence to Calohill M. Stigleman at Floyd Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Personal correspondence, September 12, 1849, to Calohill M. Stigleman at Floyd Courthouse, Virginia from Claiborne Smith of Mercer Cty, Lick Creek, Virginia, 1 original piece
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
